data.trans: Phát triển thêm dựa trên cơ sở
data.trans_hint: Họ sẽ tiếp tục xây dựng thành công trước đó của chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: They will continue to build on our previous success.
data.content_game_1: They will continue to build on our previous success.
data.answer_en_hint: They will continue to build on our previous success.

data.trans_hint: Các cô gái tụ tập lại để được gặp thần tượng của mình.
data.en_hint: The girls crowded around to meet their idols.
data.content_game_1: The girls crowded around to meet their idols.
data.answer_en_hint: The girls crowded around to meet their idols.

data.trans_hint: Quyết định của tôi sẽ phụ thuộc vào quan điểm của bạn.
data.en_hint: My decision will hinge on your views.
data.content_game_1: My decision will hinge on your views.
data.answer_en_hint: My decision will hinge on your views.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi sắp biết ai sẽ là tổng thống mới của Mỹ.
data.en_hint: We are about to find out who will be the new president of the US.
data.content_game_1: We are about to find out who will be the new president of the US.
data.answer_en_hint: We are about to find out who will be the new president of the US.

data.trans: Lên tiếng ủng hộ cái gì
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy nhận được nhiều sự ủng hộ khi anh ta lên tiếng ủng hộ hôn nhân đồng giới.
data.en_hint: He got a lot of support when he came out in favour of same sex marriage.
data.content_game_1: He got a lot of support when he came out in favour of same sex marriage.
data.answer_en_hint: He got a lot of support when he came out in favour of same sex marriage.

data.trans_hint: Sau khi họ kết thúc kiểm phiếu, họ sẽ thông báo ai là người chiến thắng cuộc bầu cử.
data.en_hint: After they finish counting up the votes, they will announce who won the election.
data.content_game_1: After they finish counting up the votes, they will announce who won the election.
data.answer_en_hint: After they finish counting up the votes, they will announce who won the election.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi thực sự mong rằng công chúng sẽ ủng hộ chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: We really hope that the public is in our favour.
data.content_game_1: We really hope that the public is in our favour.
data.answer_en_hint: We really hope that the public is in our favour.

data.trans: Ngang nhau (trong thi đấu, đọ sức ...)
data.trans_hint: Các cuộc bình chọn cuối cùng cho biết rằng họ đang ngang sức nhau.
data.en_hint: The last polls revealed that they are running neck and neck with each other.
data.content_game_1: The last polls revealed that they are running neck and neck with each other.
data.answer_en_hint: The last polls revealed that they are running neck and neck with each other.

data.trans: Mang lại lợi thế cho ai
data.trans_hint: Tất cả những ứng viên đều ngang tài, những bài phát biểu gần đây của cô ấy đã đem lại lợi thế cho cô ta.
data.en_hint: Both of the candidates are equally competent, but her recent speech has tipped the balance in her favour.
data.content_game_1: Both of the candidates are equally competent, but her recent speech has tipped the balance in her favour.
data.answer_en_hint: Both of the candidates are equally competent, but her recent speech has tipped the balance in her favour.

data.trans_hint: Hai bên đang ở trong tình thế ngang nhau, vì vậy ở thời điểm này rất khó để nói trước kết quả.
data.en_hint: The two parties are running neck and neck, so at this time it is still too close to call.
data.content_game_1: The two parties are running neck and neck, so at this time it is still too close to call.
data.answer_en_hint: The two parties are running neck and neck, so at this time it is still too close to call.
